title: [1IP-08] Simple diversification mechanism for 1inch DAO Treasury
body:
## Simple Summary

This proposal seeks to diversify the 1inch Network DAO’s Treasury composition be enacting the following strategy:

* Do not exchange a whitelisted set of tokens for USDC before sending to the 1inch DAO Treasury.
* These whitelisted tokens shall be: ETH, WETH, WBTC, DAI, and USDT.

title: [CONSTITUTIONAL] AIP: Security Council Election Process Improvements
body:
# Constitutional AIP

# Abstract

This constitutional proposal focuses on updating the Security Council election process alongside the necessary changes to the ArbitrumDAO constitution. 

We propose the following changes:

- **Increase cohort durations**. Extend the Security Council cohort duration from 1 year to 2 years, therefore reducing election frequency from twice a year to once a year.

- **Reduce qualification thresholds**. In the Nominee Selection phase, change the qualifying threshold

body:
# Abstract

This AIP proposes to upgrade Arbitrum One and Arbitrum Nova to ArbOS 50 Dia. Dia adds support for relevant Execution Layer (EL) changes from Ethereum’s upcoming [Fusaka upgrade](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7607) (Q4 2025), enabling [EIP-2537](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2537), a few bug fixes, and a handful of new features, such as a new feature called Native Mint/Burn.

### Changes on 7/7/25:

**Revised 15M ARB Alignment Structure**

* The original 15M ARB vesting allocation is now split into:

  * 10M ARB reserved for the OAT to negotiate milestone-based incentives (KPIs), equity investment, time-based bonuses, or other short/medium/long-term alignment mechanisms.

title: GLI — Incentivized Delegation Vaults
body:
Background:

Beginning in June, the UAC internally recognized votable supply, which at the time stood at ~41M UNI (relative to the 40M UNI quorum), as a potentially imminent and systemic risk to the DAO. In response, and in efforts to protect the DAO, the UAC proactively began the first Governance Logistics Improvement research report and RFC. The report sought to identify the greatest issues Uniswap governance faces, with particular emphasis on votable supply as it pertains to quorum…

title: Launching Uniswap v3 on Ronin with co-incentives
body:
## Overview

This proposal advocates for an official UniswapV3 deployment on Ronin along with a co-incentivization campaign to establish UniswapV3 as a primary DEX in the Ronin Ecosystem.

All contracts necessary for Uniswap v3 deployment will be managed under Uniswap’s governance control. To bootstrap liquidity, in combination with the migration of POL and chain-owned liquidity from the [Katana DEX](https://app.roninchain.com/swap) to Uniswap v3, Ronin proposes a $1M contribution in [RON](https

**1. Introduction**



This proposal initiates a research phase to determine the most feasible and secure way to implement cross-chain swaps between Bitcoin and EVM-compatible networks within the 1inch Fusion ecosystem.



The motivation comes from an increasing need to support native BTC interactions without relying on custodial bridges, wrapped assets, or third-party validators. While Ethereum-based sy

body:

This proposal suggests continuing the development of the alternative 1inch interface over the next 6 months, focusing on maintenance, enhanced stability and security, implementation of a p2p update system via WebTorrent, and integration of Solana network support.
